text: [Music]
the last piece of important legislation
that was passed relative to the
environment which was the brownfields
revitalization act in 2001 2002 I guess
it actually got through um unfortunately
Congress has not been able to come to
agreement on any other major piece of of
environmental legislation and not that
we needed to stop protecting our
environment but we they just can't get
the political consensus that we've had
and then you look at the non-road diesel
rule which is reducing the emissions
from non-road diesel engines tractors
and backos by 95% and those are a bigger
threat to human health and the
environment than the diesel buses and
trucks on the roads uh you look at the
Watershed approach to managing water
pollution because pollution non-point
source pollution from actions that all
of us do in our everyday lives are more
important more difficult now to deal
with than the point source pollution so
there are there are a host of things
that have been done and done well and of
course preserving one of the largest
areas of uh the water of Hawaii is a
major accomplishment setting that aside
and all environmental groups would admit
that that's a very good a very strong
statement and a very good position to
have taken
[Music]
